parent.name: installed
parent.description: Read all the installed packages in a folder, and produce an Array of all the data.

read-installed.name: read-installed
read-installed.description: Read all the installed packages in a folder, and return a tree structure with all the data.

json-stringify-safe.description: Like JSON.stringify, but doesn't blow up on circular refs

babel.name: babel
babel.description: Turn ES6 code into readable vanilla ES5 with source maps

babel-preset-es2015.name: babel-preset-es2015
babel-preset-es2015.description: Babel preset for all es2015 plugins.

yargs.name: yargs
yargs.description: Light-weight option parsing with an argv hash. No optstrings attached.

flat.name: flat
flat.description: Take a nested Javascript object and flatten it, or unflatten an object with delimited keys

split-object.name: split-object
split-object.description: Work with Objects using built-in functional Array methods
